You can stay connected with the Verus community through various social media platforms and online channels, including Facebook, YouTube, Discord, Twitter, Medium, and Reddit. You can find the specific links to these channels on the Verus website.

## Closing Thoughts

As a community project of just regular Joes, it can’t be stressed enough how important each and every one of us all are. The true power of decentralization is putting power back in the hands of **YOU**.
